entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 22 with temperature rising to minus 10 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then snow beginning before morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 22 with temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 20 to 30 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 40 gusting to 70 in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the evening then partly cloudy. Local blowing snow overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
